item.title: Sourcing Custom Parts
item.description: Many of the parts used to build Peregrine are custom designs. In some instances, these may be things you can build yourself if you have the right tools (3D printer, laser cutter, etc). In almost all cases, however, it is also possible to use our provided design files to order parts from reliable vendors. For each type of manufacturing, this page includes some notes about how we produce parts or which external vendors we have worked with.
